creator: glenmazza@yahoo.com
text:
I'm assuming this is a bug--The CommandLine, Print, and FOPTask Starters each 
call setParserFeatures() after InputHandler.getParser() to activate namespaces 
on their SAX XMLReaders.  But AWTStarter is missing the setParserFeatures() 
call.

(Actually, due to the 1-1 ratio between getParser() and setParserFeatures(), 
the code for these two functions can probably be combined in the future.  But 
this will fix the problem.)

Glen

Applied, thanks. I've modified your patch slightly: I've moved the new line 
below the null-check because setParserFeatures would have thrown an NPE if the 
parser came back null.
creator: jeremias@apache.org
gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
